name: run-in-separate-pgrp
description: Launch a console command in a newly created foreground process group

scripts.test-psql-unwrapped: echo 'Press ^C: it will kill psql, which is bad.'; echo; psql
scripts.test-psql: echo 'Press ^C: it will NOT kill psql, which is good!'; echo; ./run-in-separate-pgrp psql
